Text: PlazAmericas:  This is the third mall to be built in Houston after Gulfgate Mall opened in 1956 and Meyerland Plaza in 1957, but the first fully air-conditioned mall in Houston.

Text: PlazAmericas:  The area includes the Jewelry Exchange Center, a ten story building.

<Text: PlazAmericas:  After the mall was renamed PlazAmericas, it took a Latin American theme and catered to Hispanics.>
